events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate, including their resume and cover letter.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering based on their skills and experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process for the software engineer position.
Completed the initial screening interview focusing on the candidate's experience with software development and familiarity with our tech stack.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview.
Scheduled the technical interview with the candidate for next week to assess coding skills, problem solving, and system design knowledge.
